hero.title: Democratic
hero.subtitle: Create secure, transparent elections in minutes. From local clubs to global organizations, Vottery empowers democratic decision-making at any scale.

features.title: Everything You Need for Democratic Voting
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make your elections secure, transparent, and accessible to everyone.

secureVoting.title: Secure Voting
secureVoting.description: End-to-end encryption ensures your votes are private and tamper-proof.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Create and launch elections in minutes with our intuitive platform.

realTimeAnalytics.title: Real-time Analytics
realTimeAnalytics.description: Track votes and engagement with powerful analytics dashboards.

flexiblePricing.title: Flexible Pricing
flexiblePricing.description: Pay-as-you-go or subscribe. Choose what works best for you.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Regional pricing and multi-currency support for users worldwide.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our dedicated support team is always here to help you succeed.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started with Vottery in three simple steps

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up in seconds with email verification and two-factor authentication for maximum security.

step2.title: Choose Your Plan
step2.description: Select from flexible pricing options - pay-as-you-go or subscribe for advanced features.

step3.title: Launch Election
step3.description: Create your election, invite voters, and watch real-time results come in securely.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Organizations Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers have to say

testimonial1.quote: Vottery transformed how we conduct our annual elections. The platform is incredibly intuitive, and our members love how easy it is to vote.
testimonial1.name: John Doe

testimonial2.quote: The security features gave us complete peace of mind. Our 5,000+ members voted without a single issue. Highly recommended!
testimonial2.name: Sarah Miller

testimonial3.quote: Real-time analytics and reporting made tracking our election results effortless. The best voting platform we've ever used.
testimonial3.name: Michael Johnson

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Elections?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of organizations using Vottery to conduct secure, transparent elections.
